antiPatterns.name: Hard-Coded Endpoints
antiPatterns.description: Hardcoded IP addresses and ports of the services between connected microservices exist. Also proposed as Hardcoded IPs and Ports.
antiPatterns.consequences: Microservices connected with hardcoded endpoints lead to problems when their locations need to be changed.
